-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Pixiv API binding based on servant-client
--   
--   Pixiv API binding based on servant-client. See README for details.
@package pixiv
@version 0.1.0


-- | Authentication pixiv API. Users should not use logics in this module
--   directly, since <a>Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT</a> takes over token
--   management, providing user friendly operations.
module Web.Pixiv.Auth

-- | A wrapped <a>Text</a> represents a token.
newtype Token
Token :: Text -> Token
[unToken] :: Token -> Text

-- | Authentication credentials for pixiv API.
--   
--   Normally, users are supposed to create value of this data type using
--   <a>Password</a> constructor, then pass it to <a>runPixivT</a>.
data Credential
Password :: ByteString -> ByteString -> Credential
[username] :: Credential -> ByteString
[password] :: Credential -> ByteString
RefreshToken :: Token -> Credential
[cr_refreshToken] :: Credential -> Token

-- | Successful result.
data OAuth2Token
OAuth2Token :: Token -> Int -> Token -> OAuth2Token
[oa_accessToken] :: OAuth2Token -> Token
[oa_expiresIn] :: OAuth2Token -> Int
[oa_refreshToken] :: OAuth2Token -> Token

-- | Failed result.
data OAuth2Error
OAuth2Error :: Errors -> Text -> OAuth2Error
[oa_error] :: OAuth2Error -> Errors
[oa_message] :: OAuth2Error -> Text

-- | Authentication result.
data OAuth2Result
AuthSuccess :: OAuth2Token -> OAuth2Result
AuthFailure :: OAuth2Error -> OAuth2Result

-- | Authentication failure reasions.
data Errors
InvalidRequest :: Errors
InvalidClient :: Errors
InvalidGrant :: Errors
UnauthorizedClient :: Errors
UnsupportedGrantType :: Errors
InvalidScope :: Errors

-- | Given a credential, performs a authentication request.
auth :: Manager -> Credential -> IO OAuth2Result

-- | Like <a>auth</a>, but immediately throws <a>OAuth2Error</a> if auth
--   failed.
auth' :: Manager -> Credential -> IO OAuth2Token
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Web.Pixiv.Auth.Token
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Web.Pixiv.Auth.Token
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Web.Pixiv.Auth.Token
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Web.Pixiv.Auth.Token
instance GHC.Show.Show Web.Pixiv.Auth.Token
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Web.Pixiv.Auth.Credential
instance GHC.Show.Show Web.Pixiv.Auth.Credential
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Web.Pixiv.Auth.OAuth2Token
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Web.Pixiv.Auth.OAuth2Token
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Web.Pixiv.Auth.OAuth2Token
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Web.Pixiv.Auth.OAuth2Token
instance GHC.Show.Show Web.Pixiv.Auth.OAuth2Token
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Web.Pixiv.Auth.Errors
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Web.Pixiv.Auth.Errors
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Web.Pixiv.Auth.Errors
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Web.Pixiv.Auth.Errors
instance GHC.Show.Show Web.Pixiv.Auth.Errors
instance GHC.Exception.Type.Exception Web.Pixiv.Auth.OAuth2Error
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Web.Pixiv.Auth.OAuth2Error
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Web.Pixiv.Auth.OAuth2Error
instance GHC.Show.Show Web.Pixiv.Auth.OAuth2Error
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Web.Pixiv.Auth.OAuth2Result
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Web.Pixiv.Auth.OAuth2Result
instance GHC.Show.Show Web.Pixiv.Auth.OAuth2Result
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Web.Pixiv.Auth.OAuth2Result
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Web.Pixiv.Auth.OAuth2Error
instance Data.String.IsString Web.Pixiv.Auth.Token


-- | Data types used in API. This module enables
--   <a>DuplicateRecordFields</a>, so please consider using
--   <a>Web.Pixiv.Types.Lens</a> to access fields smoothly.
module Web.Pixiv.Types

-- | Image urls are represented in <a>Text</a>.
type ImageUrl = Text

-- | An object contains image urls.
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>Example in <a>Illust</a> or <a>MetaPage</a>: <tt> "image_urls": {
--   "square_medium": "...", "medium": "...", "large": "..." } </tt></li>
--   <li>Example in <a>User</a>: <tt> "profile_image_urls": { "medium":
--   "..." } </tt></li>
--   </ul>
data ImageUrls
ImageUrls :: Maybe ImageUrl -> Maybe ImageUrl -> Maybe ImageUrl -> Maybe ImageUrl -> ImageUrls
[$sel:_squareMedium:ImageUrls] :: ImageUrls -> Maybe ImageUrl
[$sel:_medium:ImageUrls] :: ImageUrls -> Maybe ImageUrl
[$sel:_large:ImageUrls] :: ImageUrls -> Maybe ImageUrl
[$sel:_original:ImageUrls] :: ImageUrls -> Maybe ImageUrl

-- | An object contains a single image url.
--   
--   In <a>Illust</a>: <tt> "meta_single_page": { "original_image_url":
--   "..." } </tt>
newtype OriginalImageUrl
OriginalImageUrl :: Maybe ImageUrl -> OriginalImageUrl
[$sel:_originalImageUrl:OriginalImageUrl] :: OriginalImageUrl -> Maybe ImageUrl

-- | A tag.
--   
--   Example: <tt> { "name": "...", "translated_name": null } </tt>
data Tag
Tag :: Text -> Maybe Text -> Tag
[$sel:_name:Tag] :: Tag -> Text
[$sel:_translatedName:Tag] :: Tag -> Maybe Text

-- | A trending tag.
--   
--   Don't confuse with <a>Tag</a>. <a>TrendingTag</a> contains
--   <a>Illust</a>, and the textual name of the tag is called <tt>tag</tt>,
--   instead of <tt>name</tt> in <a>Tag</a>.
data TrendingTag
TrendingTag :: Text -> Maybe Text -> Illust -> TrendingTag
[$sel:_trendTag:TrendingTag] :: TrendingTag -> Text
[$sel:_translatedName:TrendingTag] :: TrendingTag -> Maybe Text
[$sel:_illust:TrendingTag] :: TrendingTag -> Illust

-- | A wrapper of <a>TrendingTag</a>s for JSON deserialization.
newtype TrendingTags
TrendingTags :: [TrendingTag] -> TrendingTags
[$sel:_trend_tags:TrendingTags] :: TrendingTags -> [TrendingTag]

-- | Manga series.
data Series
Series :: Int -> Text -> Series
[$sel:_seriesId:Series] :: Series -> Int
[$sel:_title:Series] :: Series -> Text

-- | Type of illustration.
--   
--   In pixiv API, all of illustrations, mangas, and ugoiras are
--   represented in <a>Illust</a> data type. So they can be distinguished
--   by <a>IllustType</a>.
data IllustType
TypeIllust :: IllustType
TypeManga :: IllustType
TypeUgoira :: IllustType

-- | A page of <a>Illust</a> containing <a>ImageUrls</a>.
newtype MetaPage
MetaPage :: ImageUrls -> MetaPage
[$sel:_imageUrls:MetaPage] :: MetaPage -> ImageUrls

-- | Illustraion data type.
--   
--   See <a>IllustType</a>.
data Illust
Illust :: Int -> Text -> IllustType -> ImageUrls -> Text -> Int -> User -> [Tag] -> [Text] -> UTCTime -> Int -> Int -> Int -> Int -> Int -> Maybe Series -> Maybe OriginalImageUrl -> [MetaPage] -> Int -> Int -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Maybe Int -> Illust
[$sel:_illustId:Illust] :: Illust -> Int
[$sel:_title:Illust] :: Illust -> Text
[$sel:_illustType:Illust] :: Illust -> IllustType
[$sel:_imageUrls:Illust] :: Illust -> ImageUrls
[$sel:_caption:Illust] :: Illust -> Text
[$sel:_restrict:Illust] :: Illust -> Int
[$sel:_user:Illust] :: Illust -> User
[$sel:_tags:Illust] :: Illust -> [Tag]
[$sel:_tools:Illust] :: Illust -> [Text]
[$sel:_createDate:Illust] :: Illust -> UTCTime
[$sel:_pageCount:Illust] :: Illust -> Int
[$sel:_width:Illust] :: Illust -> Int
[$sel:_height:Illust] :: Illust -> Int
[$sel:_sanityLevel:Illust] :: Illust -> Int
[$sel:_xRestrict:Illust] :: Illust -> Int

-- | Only manga may have this field.
[$sel:_series:Illust] :: Illust -> Maybe Series

-- | Only single page illustration has this field.
[$sel:_metaSinglePage:Illust] :: Illust -> Maybe OriginalImageUrl

-- | Only multi page illustration has this field.
[$sel:_metaPages:Illust] :: Illust -> [MetaPage]
[$sel:_totalView:Illust] :: Illust -> Int
[$sel:_totalBookmarks:Illust] :: Illust -> Int

-- | For login account.
[$sel:_isBookmarked:Illust] :: Illust -> Bool
[$sel:_visible:Illust] :: Illust -> Bool
[$sel:_isMuted:Illust] :: Illust -> Bool
[$sel:_totalComments:Illust] :: Illust -> Maybe Int

-- | Response of API which returns illustrations.
data Illusts
Illusts :: [Illust] -> Maybe Text -> Illusts
[$sel:_illusts:Illusts] :: Illusts -> [Illust]
[$sel:_nextUrl:Illusts] :: Illusts -> Maybe Text

-- | A wrapper of <a>Illust</a> for JSON deserialization.
newtype IllustWrapper
IllustWrapper :: Illust -> IllustWrapper
[$sel:_illust:IllustWrapper] :: IllustWrapper -> Illust

-- | User data type.
data User
User :: Int -> Text -> Text -> ImageUrls -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> User
[$sel:_userId:User] :: User -> Int
[$sel:_name:User] :: User -> Text
[$sel:_account:User] :: User -> Text
[$sel:_profileImageUrls:User] :: User -> ImageUrls
[$sel:_comment:User] :: User -> Maybe Text

-- | For login account.
[$sel:_isFollowed:User] :: User -> Maybe Bool

-- | UserProfile data type.
--   
--   Not sure if all fields are covered, and maybe some fields should be
--   optional.
data UserProfile
UserProfile :: Maybe Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Int -> Text -> Int -> Text -> Text -> Int -> Int -> Int -> Int -> Int -> Int -> Int -> Int -> Maybe ImageUrl -> Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Bool -> UserProfile
[$sel:_webpage:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Maybe Text
[$sel:_gender:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Text
[$sel:_birth:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Text
[$sel:_birthDay:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Text
[$sel:_birthYear:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Int
[$sel:_region:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Text
[$sel:_addressId:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Int
[$sel:_countryCode:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Text
[$sel:_job:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Text
[$sel:_jobId:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Int
[$sel:_totalFollowUsers:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Int
[$sel:_totalMypixivUsers:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Int
[$sel:_totalIllusts:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Int
[$sel:_totalManga:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Int
[$sel:_totalIllustBookmarksPublic:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Int
[$sel:_totalIllustSeries:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Int
[$sel:_totalNovelSeries:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Int
[$sel:_backgroundImageUrl:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Maybe ImageUrl
[$sel:_twitterAccount:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Text
[$sel:_twitterUrl:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Maybe Text
[$sel:_pawooUrl:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Maybe Text
[$sel:_isPreminum:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Maybe Bool
[$sel:_isUsingCustomProfileImage:UserProfile] :: UserProfile -> Bool

-- | Publicity data type.
--   
--   The value <tt>public</tt> or <tt>private</tt> are present in
--   <a>ProfilePublicity</a>. This type is also used in <tt>restrict</tt>
--   query param.
data Publicity
Public :: Publicity
Private :: Publicity

-- | May not be available in <tt>restrict</tt> query param
Mypixiv :: Publicity

-- | Profile publicity of a user.
--   
--   Not sure if all fields are covered, and maybe some fields should be
--   optional.
data ProfilePublicity
ProfilePublicity :: Publicity -> Publicity -> Publicity -> Publicity -> Publicity -> Bool -> ProfilePublicity
[$sel:_gender:ProfilePublicity] :: ProfilePublicity -> Publicity
[$sel:_region:ProfilePublicity] :: ProfilePublicity -> Publicity
[$sel:_birthDay:ProfilePublicity] :: ProfilePublicity -> Publicity
[$sel:_birthYear:ProfilePublicity] :: ProfilePublicity -> Publicity
[$sel:_job:ProfilePublicity] :: ProfilePublicity -> Publicity
[$sel:_pawoo:ProfilePublicity] :: ProfilePublicity -> Bool

-- | Workspace information of a user. Not sure if all fields are covered,
--   and maybe some fields should be optional.
data Workspace
Workspace :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Maybe Text -> Workspace
[$sel:_pc:Workspace] :: Workspace -> Text
[$sel:_monitor:Workspace] :: Workspace -> Text
[$sel:_tool:Workspace] :: Workspace -> Text
[$sel:_scanner:Workspace] :: Workspace -> Text
[$sel:_tablet:Workspace] :: Workspace -> Text
[$sel:_mouse:Workspace] :: Workspace -> Text
[$sel:_printer:Workspace] :: Workspace -> Text
[$sel:_desktop:Workspace] :: Workspace -> Text
[$sel:_music:Workspace] :: Workspace -> Text
[$sel:_desk:Workspace] :: Workspace -> Text
[$sel:_chair:Workspace] :: Workspace -> Text
[$sel:_comment:Workspace] :: Workspace -> Text
[$sel:_workspaceImageUrl:Workspace] :: Workspace -> Maybe Text

-- | Details of a user.
data UserDetail
UserDetail :: User -> UserProfile -> ProfilePublicity -> Workspace -> UserDetail
[$sel:_user:UserDetail] :: UserDetail -> User
[$sel:_profile:UserDetail] :: UserDetail -> UserProfile
[$sel:_profilePublicity:UserDetail] :: UserDetail -> ProfilePublicity
[$sel:_workspace:UserDetail] :: UserDetail -> Workspace

-- | A preview of user information.
--   
--   Except <a>getUserDetail</a>, other API involving users return this
--   data type.
data UserPreview
UserPreview :: User -> [Illust] -> Value -> Bool -> UserPreview
[$sel:_user:UserPreview] :: UserPreview -> User
[$sel:_illusts:UserPreview] :: UserPreview -> [Illust]

-- | Novels are not supported currently.
[$sel:_novels:UserPreview] :: UserPreview -> Value
[$sel:_isMuted:UserPreview] :: UserPreview -> Bool

-- | Response of API which returns user previews.
data UserPreviews
UserPreviews :: [UserPreview] -> Maybe Text -> UserPreviews
[$sel:_userPreviews:UserPreviews] :: UserPreviews -> [UserPreview]
[$sel:_nextUrl:UserPreviews] :: UserPreviews -> Maybe Text

-- | A comment.
data Comment
Comment :: Int -> Text -> UTCTime -> User -> Maybe Value -> Comment
[$sel:_commentId:Comment] :: Comment -> Int
[$sel:_comment:Comment] :: Comment -> Text
[$sel:_date:Comment] :: Comment -> UTCTime
[$sel:_user:Comment] :: Comment -> User
[$sel:_parentComment:Comment] :: Comment -> Maybe Value

-- | Response of API which returns comments.
data Comments
Comments :: Int -> [Comment] -> Maybe Text -> Comments
[$sel:_totalComments:Comments] :: Comments -> Int
[$sel:_comments:Comments] :: Comments -> [Comment]
[$sel:_nextUrl:Comments] :: Comments -> Maybe Text

-- | Undecorate <tt>next_url</tt> of a type.
--   
--   <tt>next_url</tt> is returned by some APIs for paging.
type family NextUrlLess a

-- | Class to get or unwrap <tt>next_url</tt>.
class HasNextUrl a
unNextUrl :: HasNextUrl a => a -> NextUrlLess a
getNextUrl :: HasNextUrl a => a -> Maybe Text

-- | A ugoira frame.
data UgoiraFrame
UgoiraFrame :: Text -> Int -> UgoiraFrame

-- | File name.
[$sel:_ugoiraFile:UgoiraFrame] :: UgoiraFrame -> Text

-- | Duration of this frame (in millisecond).
[$sel:_ugoiraDelay:UgoiraFrame] :: UgoiraFrame -> Int

-- | A wrapper of ugoira zip file url.
newtype ZipUrls
ZipUrls :: Text -> ZipUrls
[$sel:_zipMedium:ZipUrls] :: ZipUrls -> Text

-- | Ugoira is a frame animation, whose common information is represented
--   in <a>Illust</a>. This metadata contains a link to download the zip
--   archive, which compresses frames of the ugoira; and
--   <a>UgoiraFrame</a>s to represents metadata of each frame. Using
--   <a>getUgoiraMetadata</a> can obtain value of this type. See
--   <a>ugoiraMetadataToFFConcat</a> and <a>downloadUgoiraToMP4</a>.
data UgoiraMetadata
UgoiraMetadata :: ZipUrls -> [UgoiraFrame] -> UgoiraMetadata
[$sel:_zipUrls:UgoiraMetadata] :: UgoiraMetadata -> ZipUrls
[$sel:_frames:UgoiraMetadata] :: UgoiraMetadata -> [UgoiraFrame]

-- | A wrapper of <a>UgoiraMetadata</a> for JSON deserialization.
newtype UgoiraMetadataWrapper
UgoiraMetadataWrapper :: UgoiraMetadata -> UgoiraMetadataWrapper
[$sel:_ugoiraMetadata:UgoiraMetadataWrapper] :: UgoiraMetadataWrapper -> UgoiraMetadata

-- | Spotlight article.
data SpotlightArticle
SpotlightArticle :: Int -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> UTCTime -> Text -> Text -> SpotlightArticle
[$sel:_saId:SpotlightArticle] :: SpotlightArticle -> Int
[$sel:_title:SpotlightArticle] :: SpotlightArticle -> Text
[$sel:_pureTitle:SpotlightArticle] :: SpotlightArticle -> Text
[$sel:_thumbnail:SpotlightArticle] :: SpotlightArticle -> Text
[$sel:_articleUrl:SpotlightArticle] :: SpotlightArticle -> Text
[$sel:_publishDate:SpotlightArticle] :: SpotlightArticle -> UTCTime
[$sel:_category:SpotlightArticle] :: SpotlightArticle -> Text
[$sel:_subcategoryLabel:SpotlightArticle] :: SpotlightArticle -> Text

-- | Response of API which returns spotlight articles.
data SpotlightArticles
SpotlightArticles :: [SpotlightArticle] -> Maybe Text -> SpotlightArticles
[$sel:_spotlightArticles:SpotlightArticles] :: SpotlightArticles -> [SpotlightArticle]
[$sel:_nextUrl:SpotlightArticles] :: SpotlightArticles -> Maybe Text

-- | Rank mode query parm.
--   
--   See <a>getIllustRanking</a>
data RankMode
Day :: RankMode
DayR18 :: RankMode
DayMale :: RankMode
DayMaleR18 :: RankMode
DayFemale :: RankMode
DayFemaleR18 :: RankMode
Week :: RankMode
WeekR18 :: RankMode
WeekR18G :: RankMode
Month :: RankMode
WeekOriginal :: RankMode
WeekRookie :: RankMode
DayManga :: RankMode

-- | Search target query parm.
--   
--   See <a>searchIllust</a>.
data SearchTarget
ExactMatchForTags :: SearchTarget
PartialMatchForTags :: SearchTarget
TitleAndCaption :: SearchTarget

-- | Sorting method query parm.
--   
--   See <a>searchIllust</a> and <a>searchUser</a>.
data SortingMethod
DateDesc :: SortingMethod
DateAsc :: SortingMethod

-- | Duration query parm.
--   
--   See <a>searchIllust</a>.
data Duration
WithinLastDay :: Duration
WithinLastMonth :: Duration
WithinLastYear :: Duration

instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Web.Pixiv.Types.UgoiraMetadata
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Web.Pixiv.Types.UgoiraMetadata
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Web.Pixiv.Types.UgoiraMetadata
instance GHC.Show.Show Web.Pixiv.Types.UgoiraMetadata
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Web.Pixiv.Types.UgoiraMetadata
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Web.Pixiv.Types.UgoiraMetadataWrapper
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Web.Pixiv.Types.UgoiraMetadataWrapper
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Web.Pixiv.Types.UgoiraMetadataWrapper
instance GHC.Show.Show Web.Pixiv.Types.UgoiraMetadataWrapper
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Web.Pixiv.Types.UgoiraMetadataWrapper
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Web.Pixiv.Types.SpotlightArticle
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Web.Pixiv.Types.SpotlightArticle
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Web.Pixiv.Types.SpotlightArticle
instance GHC.Show.Show Web.Pixiv.Types.SpotlightArticle
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Web.Pixiv.Types.SpotlightArticle
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Web.Pixiv.Types.SpotlightArticles
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Web.Pixiv.Types.SpotlightArticles
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Web.Pixiv.Types.SpotlightArticles
instance GHC.Show.Show Web.Pixiv.Types.SpotlightArticles
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Web.Pixiv.Types.SpotlightArticles
instance Web.Internal.HttpApiData.ToHttpApiData Web.Pixiv.Types.RankMode
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Web.Pixiv.Types.RankMode
instance GHC.Enum.Enum Web.Pixiv.Types.RankMode
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Web.Pixiv.Types.RankMode
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Web.Pixiv.Types.RankMode
instance GHC.Show.Show Web.Pixiv.Types.RankMode
instance Web.Internal.HttpApiData.ToHttpApiData Web.Pixiv.Types.SortingMethod
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Web.Pixiv.Types.SortingMethod
instance GHC.Enum.Enum Web.Pixiv.Types.SortingMethod
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Web.Pixiv.Types.SortingMethod
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Web.Pixiv.Types.SortingMethod
instance GHC.Show.Show Web.Pixiv.Types.SortingMethod
instance Web.Internal.HttpApiData.ToHttpApiData Web.Pixiv.Types.Duration
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Web.Pixiv.Types.Duration
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Web.Pixiv.Types.Duration
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Web.Pixiv.Types.Duration
instance GHC.Show.Show Web.Pixiv.Types.Duration
instance Web.Internal.HttpApiData.ToHttpApiData Web.Pixiv.Types.SearchTarget
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Web.Pixiv.Types.SearchTarget
instance GHC.Enum.Enum Web.Pixiv.Types.SearchTarget
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Web.Pixiv.Types.SearchTarget
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Web.Pixiv.Types.SearchTarget
instance GHC.Show.Show Web.Pixiv.Types.SearchTarget
instance Web.Pixiv.Types.HasNextUrl Web.Pixiv.Types.SpotlightArticles
instance Web.Pixiv.Types.HasNextUrl Web.Pixiv.Types.Comments
instance Web.Pixiv.Types.HasNextUrl Web.Pixiv.Types.UserPreviews
instance Web.Pixiv.Types.HasNextUrl Web.Pixiv.Types.Illusts


-- | Lenses of <a>Web.Pixiv.Types</a>.
module Web.Pixiv.Types.Lens
class HasSquareMedium s a | s -> a
squareMedium :: HasSquareMedium s a => Lens' s a
class HasOriginal s a | s -> a
original :: HasOriginal s a => Lens' s a
class HasMedium s a | s -> a
medium :: HasMedium s a => Lens' s a
class HasLarge s a | s -> a
large :: HasLarge s a => Lens' s a
class HasOriginalImageUrl s a | s -> a
originalImageUrl :: HasOriginalImageUrl s a => Lens' s a
class HasTranslatedName s a | s -> a
translatedName :: HasTranslatedName s a => Lens' s a

name :: HasName s a => Lens' s a
class HasTitle s a | s -> a
title :: HasTitle s a => Lens' s a
class HasSeriesId s a | s -> a
seriesId :: HasSeriesId s a => Lens' s a

xRestrict :: HasXRestrict s a => Lens' s a

width :: HasWidth s a => Lens' s a

instance Web.Pixiv.Types.Lens.HasSquareMedium Web.Pixiv.Types.ImageUrls (GHC.Maybe.Maybe Web.Pixiv.Types.ImageUrl)
instance Web.Pixiv.Types.Lens.HasOriginal Web.Pixiv.Types.ImageUrls (GHC.Maybe.Maybe Web.Pixiv.Types.ImageUrl)
instance Web.Pixiv.Types.Lens.HasMedium Web.Pixiv.Types.ImageUrls (GHC.Maybe.Maybe Web.Pixiv.Types.ImageUrl)
instance Web.Pixiv.Types.Lens.HasLarge Web.Pixiv.Types.ImageUrls (GHC.Maybe.Maybe Web.Pixiv.Types.ImageUrl)


-- | The core monad of this library. <a>PixivT</a> maintains a pixiv login
--   state, and provides an environment to perform computations created by
--   servant.
module Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT

-- | Transformer version of <a>ClientM</a>, changing the base <a>IO</a> to
--   <tt>m</tt>.
newtype ClientT m a
ClientT :: ReaderT ClientEnv (ExceptT ClientError m) a -> ClientT m a
[unClientT] :: ClientT m a -> ReaderT ClientEnv (ExceptT ClientError m) a

-- | Executes a computation in the client monad.
runClientT :: ClientEnv -> ClientT m a -> m (Either ClientError a)

-- | Given <a>Manager</a>, creates a <a>ClientEnv</a> using
--   <a>https://app-api.pixiv.net</a> as base url.
mkDefaultClientEnv :: Manager -> IO ClientEnv

-- | The mtl-style class of pixiv monad.
class (RunClient m, MonadIO m) => MonadPixiv m

-- | Reads the stored <a>PixivState</a>, when used in a multithreaded
--   setting, this should block all other thread from reading the
--   <a>PixivState</a> until <a>putPixivState</a> is called.
takePixivState :: MonadPixiv m => m PixivState

-- | Writes a new <a>PixivState</a>.
putPixivState :: MonadPixiv m => PixivState -> m ()

-- | Reads the stored <a>PixivState</a>, without blocking other threads
--   which want to read this state.
--   
--   Don't confuse with <a>takePixivState</a>, please refer to
--   <a>readMVar</a>.
readPixivState :: MonadPixiv m => m PixivState

-- | State stored in <a>MonadPixiv</a>.
data PixivState
PixivState :: TokenState -> Maybe Text -> PixivState
[tokenState] :: PixivState -> TokenState
[acceptLanguage] :: PixivState -> Maybe Text

-- | A thread safe implementation of <a>MonadPixiv</a>.
newtype PixivT m a
PixivT :: ReaderT (MVar PixivState) (ClientT m) a -> PixivT m a
[unPixivT] :: PixivT m a -> ReaderT (MVar PixivState) (ClientT m) a

-- | Lifts a computation in <a>ClientT</a> to <a>PixivT</a>.
liftC :: Monad m => ClientT m a -> PixivT m a

-- | Interprets the <a>PixivT</a> effect, with a supplied <a>Manager</a>.
runPixivT :: MonadIO m => Manager -> Credential -> PixivT m a -> m (Either ClientError a)

-- | Like <a>runPixivT</a>, but creates a new <a>Manager</a> everytime.
runPixivT' :: MonadIO m => Credential -> PixivT m a -> m (Either ClientError a)

-- | Pixiv auth state.
data TokenState
TokenState :: Token -> Token -> UTCTime -> Manager -> TokenState

-- | Token to access pixiv api.
[accessToken] :: TokenState -> Token

-- | Token to obtain new <a>accessToken</a> without giving username and
--   password.
[refreshToken] :: TokenState -> Token

-- | Time stamp when <i>both</i> <a>accessToken</a> and <a>refreshToken</a>
--   are invalid.
[expirationTime] :: TokenState -> UTCTime
[manager] :: TokenState -> Manager

-- | Computes the <a>TokenState</a>.
--   
--   This function calls <a>auth'</a> to perform authentication.
computeTokenState :: Manager -> Credential -> UTCTime -> IO TokenState

-- | Retrieves the <a>accessToken</a> from pixiv monad.
--   
--   If the token is overdue, it will call <a>computeTokenState</a> to
--   refresh.
getAccessToken :: MonadPixiv m => m Token

-- | Retrieves the <a>accessToken</a> and <a>acceptLanguage</a> in one go.
getAccessTokenWithAccpetLanguage :: MonadPixiv m => m (Token, Maybe Text)
instance Control.Monad.Trans.Control.MonadBaseControl b m => Control.Monad.Trans.Control.MonadBaseControl b (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.ClientT m)
instance Control.Monad.Base.MonadBase b m => Control.Monad.Base.MonadBase b (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.ClientT m)
instance GHC.Base.Monad m => Control.Monad.Error.Class.MonadError Servant.Client.Core.ClientError.ClientError (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.ClientT m)
instance GHC.Base.Monad m => Control.Monad.Reader.Class.MonadReader Servant.Client.Internal.HttpClient.ClientEnv (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.ClientT m)
instance Control.Monad.Catch.MonadCatch m => Control.Monad.Catch.MonadCatch (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.ClientT m)
instance Control.Monad.Catch.MonadThrow m => Control.Monad.Catch.MonadThrow (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.ClientT m)
instance Control.Monad.IO.Class.MonadIO m => Control.Monad.IO.Class.MonadIO (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.ClientT m)
instance GHC.Base.Monad m => GHC.Base.Monad (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.ClientT m)
instance GHC.Base.Monad m => GHC.Base.Applicative (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.ClientT m)
instance GHC.Base.Functor m => GHC.Base.Functor (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.ClientT m)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.TokenState
instance GHC.Show.Show Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.PixivState
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.PixivState
instance GHC.Generics.Generic (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.PixivT m a)
instance GHC.Base.Monad m => Control.Monad.Error.Class.MonadError Servant.Client.Core.ClientError.ClientError (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.PixivT m)
instance GHC.Base.Monad m => Control.Monad.Reader.Class.MonadReader (GHC.MVar.MVar Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.PixivState) (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.PixivT m)
instance Control.Monad.Catch.MonadCatch m => Control.Monad.Catch.MonadCatch (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.PixivT m)
instance Control.Monad.Catch.MonadThrow m => Control.Monad.Catch.MonadThrow (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.PixivT m)
instance Control.Monad.IO.Class.MonadIO m => Control.Monad.IO.Class.MonadIO (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.PixivT m)
instance GHC.Base.Monad m => GHC.Base.Monad (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.PixivT m)
instance GHC.Base.Monad m => GHC.Base.Applicative (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.PixivT m)
instance GHC.Base.Functor m => GHC.Base.Functor (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.PixivT m)
instance Control.Monad.Base.MonadBase GHC.Types.IO m => Control.Monad.Base.MonadBase GHC.Types.IO (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.PixivT m)
instance Control.Monad.Trans.Control.MonadBaseControl GHC.Types.IO m => Control.Monad.Trans.Control.MonadBaseControl GHC.Types.IO (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.PixivT m)
instance (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.MonadPixiv m, Control.Monad.Trans.Class.MonadTrans f, Control.Monad.IO.Class.MonadIO (f m), Servant.Client.Core.RunClient.RunClient (f m)) => Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.MonadPixiv (f m)
instance Control.Monad.IO.Class.MonadIO m => Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.MonadPixiv (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.PixivT m)
instance Control.Monad.Trans.Class.MonadTrans Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.PixivT
instance Control.Monad.IO.Class.MonadIO m => Servant.Client.Core.RunClient.RunClient (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.PixivT m)
instance GHC.Show.Show Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.TokenState
instance Control.Monad.Trans.Class.MonadTrans Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.ClientT
instance Control.Monad.IO.Class.MonadIO m => Servant.Client.Core.RunClient.RunClient (Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT.ClientT m)


-- | Functions to access pixiv api. They are supposed to be run in
--   <a>Web.Pixiv.Types.PixivT</a>.
--   
--   You may notice that except <a>getUserBookmarks</a>, many of functions
--   take a <tt>page</tt> as input. This is because each query contains 30
--   entries (except <a>getSpotlightArticles'</a>s , which containes 10),
--   i.e. you should pass <tt>2</tt> if you want items ranged from 31 to
--   60.
module Web.Pixiv.API

-- | Gets trending tags.
getTrendingTags :: MonadPixiv m => Maybe Bool -> m [TrendingTag]

-- | Gets recommended illustrations of the account which is used for login.
getRecommendedIllusts :: MonadPixiv m => Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> m [Illust]

-- | Gets recommended mangas of the account which is used for login.
getRecommendedMangas :: MonadPixiv m => Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> m [Illust]

-- | Gets the details of a illustration.
getIllustDetail :: MonadPixiv m => Int -> m Illust

-- | Gets the comments of a illustration.
getIllustComments :: MonadPixiv m => Int -> Int -> m Comments

-- | Gets related illustrations.
getIllustRelated :: MonadPixiv m => Int -> Int -> m [Illust]

-- | Gets ranking illustrations.
getIllustRanking :: MonadPixiv m => Maybe RankMode -> Int -> m [Illust]

-- | Gets illustrations of artists which the login account follows.
getIllustFollow :: MonadPixiv m => Publicity -> Int -> m [Illust]

-- | Gets the newest illustrations.
getIllustNew :: MonadPixiv m => Int -> m [Illust]

-- | Gets the metadata of a ugoira
getUgoiraMetadata :: MonadPixiv m => Int -> m UgoiraMetadata

-- | Searches an illustration.
searchIllust :: MonadPixiv m => SearchTarget -> Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe SortingMethod -> Maybe Duration -> Int -> m [Illust]

-- | Searches an user.
searchUser :: MonadPixiv m => Text -> Maybe SortingMethod -> Int -> m [UserPreview]

-- | Gets the details of an user.
getUserDetail :: MonadPixiv m => Int -> m UserDetail

-- | Gets illustrations submitted by a specific user.
getUserIllusts :: MonadPixiv m => Int -> Maybe IllustType -> Int -> m [Illust]

-- | Gets the following of an user.
getUserFollowing :: MonadPixiv m => Int -> Publicity -> Int -> m [UserPreview]

-- | Gets the followers of an user.
getUserFollower :: MonadPixiv m => Int -> Int -> m [UserPreview]

-- | Gets <tt>mypixiv</tt> of an user.
getUserMypixiv :: MonadPixiv m => Int -> Int -> m [UserPreview]

-- | Gets illustrations collected by a specific user. Returns the a list of
--   illustrations and result and an integer for paging.
getUserBookmarks :: MonadPixiv m => Int -> Publicity -> Maybe Int -> m ([Illust], Maybe Int)

-- | Gets spotlight articles
getSpotlightArticles :: MonadPixiv m => Maybe Text -> Int -> m [SpotlightArticle]


-- | Example usage:
--   
--   <pre>
--   import Web.Pixiv
--   
--   main :: IO ()
--   main = do
--     let credential = Password "username" "password"
--     illust &lt;- runPixivT' credential $ getIllustDetail 70479649
--     print illust
--   </pre>
--   
--   This will print illustration information of
--   <a>https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/70479649</a>.
--   
--   More information is available on <a>README</a>.
module Web.Pixiv

-- | Authentication credentials for pixiv API.
--   
--   Normally, users are supposed to create value of this data type using
--   <a>Password</a> constructor, then pass it to <a>runPixivT</a>.
data Credential
Password :: ByteString -> ByteString -> Credential


-- | Miscellaneous utilities.
module Web.Pixiv.Utils

-- | Judges if an illustration has only one image.
isSinglePageIllust :: Illust -> Bool

-- | Extracts the url of the highest quality image.
extractHighestQualityImageUrl :: ImageUrls -> Maybe Text

-- | Extracts all urls from an illustration, using
--   <a>extractHighestQualityImageUrl</a>.
extractImageUrlsFromIllust :: Illust -> [Text]

-- | Unzip a zip archive represented in <a>ByteString</a> to a directory.
unzipArchive :: FilePath -> ByteString -> IO ()

-- | Generates ffconcat meta file of an ugoira.
ugoiraMetadataToFFConcat :: UgoiraMetadata -> ByteString


-- | A set of utilities for downloading pixiv things.
module Web.Pixiv.Download

-- | <a>DownloadM</a> monad is a synonym for <a>IO</a> computation wrapped
--   in <a>Manager</a> environment, which may exit without producing value,
--   indicating the download failed.
type DownloadM = MaybeT (ReaderT Manager IO)

-- | Lifts a pure <a>Maybe</a> value to <a>DownloadM</a>.
liftMaybe :: Maybe a -> DownloadM a

-- | Lifts a download computation to <a>PixivT</a>.
--   
--   <a>DownloadM</a> needs <a>Manager</a> to perform the download, which
--   can be provided by <a>TokenState</a>.
liftToPixivT :: MonadIO m => DownloadM a -> PixivT m (Maybe a)

-- | Executes the download computation in <a>IO</a>.
runDownloadM :: Manager -> DownloadM a -> IO (Maybe a)

-- | Downloads something in <a>DownloadM</a>, given url.
downloadPixiv :: Text -> DownloadM ByteString

-- | Downloads a single page illust.
--   
--   Chooses the first one if the illust has many pages, preferring high
--   quality images. Returns <a>Nothing</a> if can't find any image url.
downloadSingleIllust :: Illust -> DownloadM ByteString

-- | Downloads <a>UgoiraFrame</a>s, then converts it to MP4 calling
--   external <tt>ffmpeg</tt>.
downloadUgoiraToMP4 :: UgoiraMetadata -> Maybe FilePath -> DownloadM (String, ByteString)
